definition: non-competitive election (i.e. with as many candidates as there are seats)/single-candidate election
class/rank/grade/equal to/same as/to wait for/to await/et cetera/and so on/et al. (and other authors)/after/as soon as/once
forehead/horizontal tablet or inscribed board/specified number or amount
to lift/to hold up/to cite/to enumerate/to act/to raise/to choose/to elect/act/move/deed

sentences.english: If only one candidate is nominated, a non-competitive election may be conducted.
sentences.chinese: 如果提名的候選人只有一人，也可以等額選舉。

sentences.english: I'll attend a single-candidate election in the afternoon.
sentences.chinese: 下午我要參加一個等額選舉。
